name: Story-time
description:
Games Members
- A simple 2D platformer telling a story about love over time
- The game is a timeline, things to the left are the past, things to the right are the future. Seasons will cycle to show the passing of relative time.

- We love hearing feedback! Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/NDcisiveGames/
Designed and created by: Steven Coffey, Sam Reid, Carrie Dell, & Zach Smith
